posts.post_title: FS lot of 5 S74 silks with backs
posts.post_content:
Rube Marquard - with back, not attached.
John Bates - with back, not attached.
Red Dooin - in two pieces, with back, half attached, half not.
Al Bridwell - in two pieces, with back, half attached, half not.
Harry McIntyre 

No longer available.
